person.bio: Winston Ma, CFA & Esq. an investor, attorney, author, and adjunct professor in the global digital economy. He is one of a small number of native Chinese who have worked as investment professionals and practicing capital markets attorneys in both the United States and China. At ThreeFold, he is Vice Chairman of the Advisory Board of ThreeFold Tech.
person.excerpt: Winston Ma, CFA & Esq. an investor, attorney, author, and adjunct professor in the global digital economy.
